attributes.action: SUPPORT MARK RECKLESS by announcing that deportation of ANYBODY who is not legally here is PRECISELY what the voters want.
attributes.additional_details: Anybody who is not a UKIP supporter is now coming round to their views for fear of losing their places at the trough - such are the priorities and the proof that our electeds ARE dishonourables.  ANYBODY who is not a British citizen who is not here legally AND any foreigner here, legally or not, who commits a crime - even a parking offence - MUST be deported.   WE HAVE FAR TOO MANY PEOPLE ON THESE ISLANDS AND STEPS MUST BE TAKEN TO REMOVE THOSE WHO SHOULD NOT BE HERE.
